subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Barbaro’s chances of survival may hinge on his body’s ability to regrow the hoof on his left rear leg, his primary veterinarian, Dr. Dean Richardson, said.
snippet: Barbaro’s chances of survival may hinge on his body’s ability to regrow the hoof on his left rear leg, his primary veterinarian, Dr. Dean Richardson, said.
